objects.title: The great good post that we all like to read very much and it's very good and you should be pleased with yourself for getting this far
objects.content:
Now, when you do this without getting punched in the chest, you'll have more fun. Steve Holt! I don't criticize you! And if you're worried about criticism, sometimes a diet is the best defense. No… but I'd like to be asked!

He'll want to use your yacht, and I don't want this thing smelling like fish. I'm half machine. I'm a monster. Oh, you're gonna be in a coma, all right. Well, what do you expect, mother? That's what it said on 'Ask Jeeves.'

Whoa, this guy's straight? I'm half machine. I'm a monster. No, I did not kill Kitty. However, I am going to oblige and answer the nice officer's questions because I am an honest man with no secrets to hide.

I hear the jury's still out on science. I'm a monster. Not tricks, Michael, illusions. Across from where? There's so many poorly chosen words in that sentence. Say goodbye to these, because it's the last time!

Get me a vodka rocks. And a piece of toast. No, I did not kill Kitty. However, I am going to oblige and answer the nice officer's questions because I am an honest man with no secrets to hide. Guy's a pro.

  1. But I bought a yearbook ad from you, doesn't that mean anything anymore?
  2. Oh, you're gonna be in a coma, all right.
  3. Did you enjoy your meal, Mom? You drank it fast enough.

Did you enjoy your meal, Mom? You drank it fast enough. That's what it said on 'Ask Jeeves.' Oh, you're gonna be in a coma, all right. Now, when you do this without getting punched in the chest, you'll have more fun.

Did you enjoy your meal, Mom? You drank it fast enough. Across from where? Whoa, this guy's straight? I'm a monster. Well, what do you expect, mother?

  • Oh, you're gonna be in a coma, all right.
  • We just call it a sausage.
  • There's so many poorly chosen words in that sentence.

Army had half a day. There's only one man I've ever called a coward, and that's Brian Doyle Murray. No, what I'm calling you is a television actor. Really? Did nothing cancel? That's what it said on 'Ask Jeeves.'

We just call it a sausage. Not tricks, Michael, illusions. Michael! He'll want to use your yacht, and I don't want this thing smelling like fish.

Michael! But I bought a yearbook ad from you, doesn't that mean anything anymore? Steve Holt! No… but I'd like to be asked! Not tricks, Michael, illusions.

I care deeply for nature. Steve Holt! He'll want to use your yacht, and I don't want this thing smelling like fish. Now, when you do this without getting punched in the chest, you'll have more fun.

I don't understand the question, and I won't respond to it. He'll want to use your yacht, and I don't want this thing smelling like fish. But I bought a yearbook ad from you, doesn't that mean anything anymore?

No… but I'd like to be asked! He'll want to use your yacht, and I don't want this thing smelling like fish. I don't criticize you! And if you're worried about criticism, sometimes a diet is the best defense.

I'm half machine. I'm a monster. I hear the jury's still out on science. I'm half machine. I'm a monster. I'm afraid I just blue myself. We just call it a sausage.

Really? Did nothing cancel? I hear the jury's still out on science. Say goodbye to these, because it's the last time! It's a hug, Michael. I'm hugging you. Did you enjoy your meal, Mom? You drank it fast enough.

I've opened a door here that I regret. We just call it a sausage. Michael! It's a hug, Michael. I'm hugging you. No, I did not kill Kitty. However, I am going to oblige and answer the nice officer's questions because I am an honest man with no secrets to hide.

Bad news. Andy Griffith turned us down. He didn't like his trailer. Say goodbye to these, because it's the last time! But I bought a yearbook ad from you, doesn't that mean anything anymore? Steve Holt!

First place chick is hot, but has an attitude, doesn't date magicians. I'm a monster. Not tricks, Michael, illusions. Guy's a pro. Whoa, this guy's straight?
